notes: Testing obstacle discovery, tracking and sharing via message
Fault injection object must only include action (subtask) IDs...
fault_injection does not have to be manually defined, so only do if testing.
Will have to add initManualFaultInjectionTracker call to world constructor for the above.
Define fault_percentage instead by default. fault_percentage should be an int between 0 and 100
Lower decay_rate relates to comms and corresponds to domains with less obstruction (e.g. 1.5 more clear, 3.0 more cluttered)
random_seed of 0 results in different seed every run

_comments: Capabilities (task types they can do) of the agents by agent type
Will add more task types later
There must be at least one agent of each type below
For each task, there must be at least one agent at the start capable of doing it
